title: Flow Rate Formula
text: Flow rate $$=$$ Speed × Fuel consumption per km

title: Determine the Fuel Efficiency in Terms of cm³ per Kilometer
text: Given that the car travels $$10$$ km per liter of gasoline:1 L $$=$$ $$1000$$ $${cm}^3$$. The car uses $$1000$$ cm³ of gasoline to travel $$10$$ km. Therefore, what is the consumption per kilometer?

title: Calculate the Fuel Consumption Rate in cm³/s
text: First conver the speed of the car from $$\frac{km}{h}$$ to $$\frac{km}{s}$$, then use the formula to compute the flow rate in $$\frac{{cm}^3}{s}$$.
